title: Star Trek Online

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Loading screen appears but the progress bar never moves, video driver crashes

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Audio crackles get increasingly worse until another sound card is chosen (buffer issue?) and controls often lock up, press false keys or lose track of the mouse during combat scenarios. Otherwise everything seems to be running as if native.

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Launcher freezes after all files have been downloaded and game fails to launch.

notes: The STO launcher opens, and the game downloads/updates, but won't start after clicking the 'engage' button.

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Mouse tracking sometimes is off, audio occasionally crackles

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Sat for a while on the loading screen on first start - just wait.

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Slightly more stutters than Windows version.  Did not work with driver 390.67, but starts fine on 390.87.  First time you log in it takes a very long time to start (if the bar fills it is working).  Fullscreen Windowed mode seems to work best.  It may be necessary to start in safe mode to reset the graphics options.  Tested for 30 minutes.

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Nothing needed for it to work, runs great

title: Star Trek Online
notes: Choose safe login if game times out connecting to servers, only had to do this on first launch.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.0-sabayon, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Launcher works fine, the game launches and plays without issue though it will stutter a bit without the poe stutter fix.
title: Star Trek Online

notes: Everything works. After hours of play, you may start to hear sound glitching. Restarting the game makes it go away.
